column5: Plan your ultimate Texas escape to this 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom vacation rental house in San Leon. Boasting 1,236 square feet, this home comfortably sleeps 12 and is perfect for couples, families or friends traveling together. Just 1 block off the water with clear views of the bay, you can watch pelicans diving for fish or the fireworks show on Friday nights off the Kemah Boardwalk. No matter how you choose to spend your time here, youâ€™re sure to have unforgettable vacation!
column8: New! 3BR San Leon House w/ Balcony & Bay Views!
